products.title: Emilia Embroidered Grey Roman Blind
products.description: If your style is a little more refined then look no further than this delightful emilia embroidered grey roman blind from tuiss. The delicate blossoms are stitched into a mid grey fabric to create a stunning floral pattern. The flashes of bright white give balance and shade to a if your style is a little more refined then look no further than this delightful emilia embroidered grey roman blind from tuiss.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark grey panel blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their voile moondust grey panel is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, panelblinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this panel blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cosmic Grey Panel Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant mood voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This light grey panel blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. This cosmic grey panel is flame retardant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, panel blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this panel blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.description: Product id: sdb-plf0159 fabric colour: taupe material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium headrail - wide colour options available control type: cord energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes cellular taupe thermal pleated blind in brown. Made to measure from 39. 98 with free uk mainland delivery. This thermal pleated blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

products.description: Product id: sdb-plf0157 fabric colour: nightfall grey material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium headrail - wide colour options available control type: cord energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes cellular nightfall grey thermal pleated blind in grey. products.title: Rio Blackout Solar Charcoal Neat Fit Honeycomb Pleated Blind
products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. One of their deepest black shades in the neat fit range, rio charcoal could be used as a eye-catching feature piece or used to just help blend a theme together. Product id: db-nfpl0034 fabric colour: charcoal material: 100% polyester lining: reflective blackout silver backing - uv blocking headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Metallic 25mm Brushstroke Silver T0950 Neat Fit Aluminium Venetian Blind
products.description: The metallic range offers the best urban and contemporary feel of the metallic blind that will add a character to any space. Add something different to the style of any room with their metallic 25mm brushstroke silver venetian blind. This blind is ideal with neutral colour schemes. Product id: db-nfven0009 fabric colour: brushstroke silver t0950 material: aluminium headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips - co-ordinating cords slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Rainbow 25mm Anthracite Grey T1679 Neat Fit Aluminium Venetian Blind
products.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finish venetian blinds, available in a full spectrum of colour. This matt grey venetian blind is the perfect choice to add colour and warmth to any room in your home. See their perfect fit venetian collection - this slat is colour match for the anthracite frame available now. Product id: db-nfven0004 fabric colour: anthracite grey t1679 material: aluminium headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips - co-ordinating cords slat width: 25mm control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
